name: Me and Me
description:
Your reflection has broken out of the mirror and is now mirroring your every move! Get you and your reflection to their respective mirrors so that you can become one again.

This is the first game I have ever created, so any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Please note the HTML5 version may not work perfectly. Download the windows file for the best experience.

This game was created for the Weekly Game Jam 148 with the theme: "Mirror"

Credits:

Assets / Programming by myself

Music: "Old City Theme"  by remaxim on opengameart.org
